name: Cat Plates
description:
Made for the 5 hour "Oh my god, what have I done" themed https://itch.io/jam/2018-bawgames-con

So the narrative was supposed to be you accidentally drop  so custom plates and are trying to glue them back together. But I didn't have time to do all the masking work I wanted to get done to really sell it or any audio. 

I was trying to come up with a concept that worked well for an Instant Game since facebook just made the SDK public so a quick cute timed cat based game I think fits that description.

For this jam I used phaser and typescript. 5 hours was really to short to get any art in that I wanted, other than pictures of my cats.
